Server.server.urls: Web server will listen to certain ports and protocols. Server has auto https redirect so http(ex.80) and https(ex.443) port setting are recommended for easier browser access.
Server.SecretKey: Secret key is used for signing auth tokens. Its changing makes all existing tokens invalid, all users will have to relogin. It is not recommended to change the secret key unless it becomes compromised.

Credentials.Admin: Has full rights to modify AlgoServer state. Available both in browser and AlgoTerminal.
Credentials.Dealer: Has the same access as Viewer, but can start and stop bots. Available only in AlgoTerminal.
Credentials.Viewer: Has readonly access to AlgoServer state. A user can download logs and see packages, accounts, logs, bots and their status. A user cant see AlgoData and downloaded packages. Available only in AlgoTerminal.

Ssl.File: PKCS#12 file containing private and public keys for web server certificate, that are protected by password. Since we don't have own certificate authority server, this feature is disabled now.
Ssl.Password: Password to required to open PKCS#12 file.

Protocol.ListeningPort: Port that is used for AlgoTerminal connection. It should be different from web server ports.
Protocol.LogDirectoryName: Directory where AlgoTermianl connection logs will be stored.
Protocol.LogMessages: Enables writing messages sent over AlgoTerminal connection to logs. Only for troubleshooting, has severe impact on performance.

Fdk.EnableLogs: Enables writing messages sent over trade server connection to logs. Only for troubleshooting, has severe impact on performance.

MultipleAgentProvider.ManagingBotSettingsOnServer: Allows you to transfer bot and account settings between servers

Algo.EnableDevMode: If Develop mode is enabled, package runtimes rise when some plugin has been added to AlgoServer, else runtimes rise only if plugin is running.
